title: For the ladies
author: VD
content_html: All the football fans have seen this one, but let’s face it, it just never grows old. I discovered that one of my boys hadn’t seen it, so I’ll rectify the situation for the rest of you. You can’t deny it, The man is a happy guy.
content_text:
All the football fans have seen this one, but let’s face it, it just never grows old.  I discovered that one of my boys hadn’t seen it, so I’ll rectify the situation for the rest of you.  You can’t deny it,
The man is a happy guy
.
